price: Ṣé kò ti jẹ́ àtọ̀ mọnī tí wọ́n dà jáde sínú àpòlùkẹ́ ni?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
